value.title: Create a date range parameter with Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: How do you do a date range with the Paginated visual used with Power BI Paginated Reports? Adam shows you how to get a date range going without passing every day's value within the range.  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.title: Multi select slicer in Power BI

value.title: Power BI Visualization Tip   Hide or Lock the Filter for Users
